p:
The present manuscript illustrates the use of the PathogenID v3.0 resequencing microarray to map the genetic diversity of several endemic hantaviruses mainly associated with human disease in Europe, such as PUUV, DOBV, including genotypes Dobrava and Saarema
25 , TULV, SEOV, Topografov hantavirus (TOPV) according to their geographical distribution.
